divs: Sighting Detailswas going out to get something from car noticed 2 orange light in the eastern sky i was high and to the left the other low and to the right. both moving same speed up. i went to my car to got my camera and when i came back 30 sec. they were both gone. about 10 sec later 2 more appeared and i started filming. i was able to capture one more set on my camera before i ran out of room on disc. after i stopped filming 2 more sets went buy. all together about 15 minuits
Summary: red orb in eastern sky from Columbus Ohio
